TopicTitle: Wondering if this exists, or can be created

Articles.Content:
I've searched quite a bit, but I've had no luck finding a planning tool that would show me when specific areas of a body would be in daylight or darkness.

If I want to launch to the East Crater, I'd love to be able to look up (even in an outside tool), when the sun would rise and set there. I'd then be able to figure out when to launch to get there in daylight. 

I can do that now by looking through the tracking station and orbital view, kinda.. 

Does what I'm asking about make sense?
Yes, it makes sense, but I don't know any mod yet. Just wanted you to know that
